data.title: Charles Hutton Jr. Obituary 2023
data.meta_description: Charles Leo Hutton Jr. Born 11-17-1962. Died 5-1-23      Preceded in death by parents Charles Sr. and Grace Helen Hutton; Sisters Joan Trail and Mary Helen Clemens. Survived by...
data.text:
Charles Leo Hutton Jr. Born 11-17-1962. Died 5-1-23

Preceded in death by parents Charles Sr. and Grace Helen Hutton; Sisters Joan Trail and Mary Helen Clemens. Survived by wife Pat Smythia; Daughter Dana Hackney (Chris);

Granddaughters Briana Carney, Isabelle Carney, Caitlyn Hackney; Sisters Era Wood, Violet Hutton, Carolyn (Ann) Carroll, and lots of nieces and nephews. In his early years, Charlie was a

tile setter and later went into maintenance work. He enjoyed fishing, bowling, riding his lawn mower, and spending time with family. He is very loved and will be missed by many. Charlie is

being cremated and the family will have a memorial to be scheduled at a later time.
